title: Calculating the Confidence Interval
body: Suppose scores on exams in statistics are normally distributed with an unknown population mean and a population standard deviation of three points. A random sample of $$36$$ scores is taken and gives a sample mean (sample mean score) of $$68$$. Find a confidence interval estimate for the population mean exam score (the mean score on all exams).
lesson: 7.1 The process of estimation. Introduction to Confidence Intervals
